column1: Art Institute of Chicago////There is a "Member's Lounge" downstairs where complimentary hot cocoa
column2: coffee & tea are available daily. (Cocoa only in winter) not to mention the fact that you can just relax while looking out at the center courtyard
column4: it's bustling with diners enjoying the weather
column6: it's got that stark "colder than get out" vibe that could only be hewn by Nature's wild winter brush.  Should this desolateness rustle up a yearning within you...I mean
column7: do you need a sandwich or bowl of soup?...discount!...10% off in all museum restaurants. Decide that a nice book from the museum should make its way home with you?...discount!...
